name: International Conference on Clinical and Medical Sciences
content: International Conference on Clinical and Medical Sciences (CAMS) October 07 \~ 08, 2023, Virtual Conference Scope & Topics International Conference on Clinical and Medical Sciences (CAMS) will provide an excellent knowledge. The goal of the conference is to reach researchers and practitioners from academia and industry to focus on understanding advances in Medical Sciences and establishing new collaborations in these areas. The aim of the conference is to provide a platform to the researchers and both academia and industry to meet and also to share the development in this field. Only original research papers are invited for the publication. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to: Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following Anatomy Biomedical Intelligence Cardiovascular Medicine And Haematology Clinical Data Analysis Clinical Sciences Complimentary And Alternative Medicine Dentistry Health Informatics Hematology History of Medicine Human Movement and Sports Science Human Physiology Immunology Medical Biochemistry Medical Cell Biology Medical Genetics Medical Microbiology Medical Physiology Medical Statistics Medical Virology Medicinal Chemistry Metabolomics Neurosciences Neurosurgery Nursing Nutrition and Dietetics Occupational Medicine Oncology and Carcinogensis Optometry and Opthamology Paediatrics and Reproductive Medicine Pathology Pharmaceutical Sciences Pharmacology and Pharmaceutical Sciences Public Health and Health Services Radiology Respiration Therapy Tissue Embryology Urology Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by September 09, 2023\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by International Journal of Bioinformatics and Biosciences (IJBB) (Confirmed). Selected papers from CAMS 2023, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal. Bioscience & Engineering: An International Journal (BIOEJ) International Journal of Advances in Biology (IJAB) International Journal of Biomedical Engineering and Science (IJBES) Advanced Medical Sciences: An International Journal (AMS) Important Dates Submission Deadline : September 09, 2023 Authors Notification : October 02, 2023 Final Manuscript Due : October 04, 2023
